example.text: I've been working with [[user]] for years. A friendly, passionate, hardworking man — anything but threatening. Representative Greene is the aggressor here — pushing an age-old, racist trope used to target and discredit Black men. We see through it. [[url]]

Legislative Update I'm grateful to the Valley Forge National Historical Park planners and my colleagues in the House for passing my Valley Forge Park Realignment Permit and Promise Act . This bipartisan bill is a commonsense way to ensure park improvements without further delay - allowing for better connectivity and aesthetic for visitors of this historic treasure.

This week, I was also honored to attend President Biden's signing of the Respect for Marriage Act at the White House. The House passed the Respect for Marriage Act this summer and sent it to the Senate.

Learn more and sign up here . PFAS Health Study The CDC and the Agency for Toxic Substances and Disease Registry is conducting a national PFAS Health Study - which includes our district - and the impact this forever chemical has had on our residents.

For the 118th Congress, I'm grateful to continue serving on the House Judiciary Committee - and will soon being serving on the House Foreign Affairs Committee . I'm ready to work for the common good, both at home and abroad, and will do so with our communities in mind.

This week, I was also honored to attend President Biden's signing of the Respect for Marriage Act at the White House. The House passed the Respect for Marriage Act this summer and sent it to the Senate.
